content: While fighting Turtle Treasure, you will want to make sure to look out for the mallet it swings at you. A Pluck of Many or Immobilize makes this fight a lot easier if you don't have the Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Turtle_Treasure_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Turtle Treasure Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Turtle Treasure Fight'.
The content is as follows:
While fighting Turtle Treasure, you will want to make sure to look out for the mallet it swings at you. A Pluck of Many or Immobilize makes this fight a lot easier if you don't have the Gourd.
